privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: At Heroicsoft, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and safeguard your data when you use our services.

dataCollection.title: Information We Collect
dataCollection.content: We collect information that you provide directly to us, including when you create an account, contact us, or use our services. This may include:
items: Personal identification information (name, email address, phone number)
Professional information (company name, job title)
Technical data (IP address, browser type, device information)
Usage data (pages visited, time spent on site, interaction with features)

dataUsage.title: How We Use Your Information
dataUsage.content: We use the collected information for various purposes to provide and improve our services:
items: To provide, maintain, and improve our services
To communicate with you about updates, offers, and support
To personalize your experience and deliver relevant content
To analyze usage patterns and optimize our platform
To detect, prevent, and address technical issues or fraudulent activities

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. Our security practices include encryption, secure servers, regular security audits, and strict access controls. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your browsing experience, analyze site traffic, and understand user preferences. You can control cookie settings through your browser preferences. Disabling cookies may affect some functionality of our services.

rights.title: Your Rights and Choices
rights.content: You have certain rights regarding your personal information:
items: Access: Request access to the personal data we hold about you
Correction: Request correction of inaccurate or incomplete data
Deletion: Request deletion of your personal data, subject to legal obligations
Opt-out: Unsubscribe from marketing communications at any time
Data Portability: Request a copy of your data in a structured format

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions, concerns, or requests regarding this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please don't hesitate to contact us:

terms.intro: Welcome to Heroicsoft. By accessing and using our services, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. Please read them carefully before using our platform.

If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our services. userResponsibilities.title: User Responsibilities
userResponsibilities.content: As a user of our services, you agree to:

Maintain the confidentiality of your account credentials
Comply with all applicable laws and regulations
